column5: @hunome @rossdawson Well said @rossdawson and thank you for invites to events back in Sydney. One day :)
Connected writing brings another layer of learning. What trains of thought today? Connected thinking/ writing with others brings one more layer.

Great study into what makes a person a genius. Curiosity is one element. So is viewing things from many angles. Come and flex your genius and perceptiveness muscle with us. 

#hunome #multidimensional #sharedunderstanding #curiosity #toolsforthinking https://t.co/cm1UksEi23?
Thinker - looking for a social network that builds, no fleeting messages. Here your thinking grows, perspectives are seen and understanding has impact? #hunome @hunome

Things make no sense when simple slogans replace understanding of complex issues. We repeat the simple as it is easy. Then become jaded and apathetic as it is all too late to act. Hope goes. The vibes of this vicious circle are there, now what? It is everyone's responsibility.

Including the young in designing the future. @BertelsmannFdn and @HumanityAction created worthy animations to understand how young in Germany and the US see our global challenges. Neat!

https://t.co/R7z3usqTM5

#sharedunderstanding #shapingthefuture #hunome
@hunome @ptamesis We all have experiences that might just be the eye opener! We alone with our experience are not yet ’research’ but in the aggregate it matters!

Brilliant: Power of connection - curiosity styles and history and more in a book by sisters who combined their multidisciplinary perspectives. Thank you Penny Zurn and @daniSBassett (Hunome is built for these behaviors) https://t.co/5P8qTWciWu

History casts long shadows in the minds of injured parties who do not stop to think of the future build for the many but rather history mending to that historical position. Very sad.

Our workshop at #MozFest on ‘Using perspectives to tackle #misinformation’ is approaching fast, it’s important. It’s hard to know what’s true to combat misinformation when information is scattered.

At 13:00 (UTC+1) on March 7th. https://t.co/44V2GZ6Abb
#human-aware

We, Hunome team, will host an event at MozFest 2022. Very much looking forward to building multidimensional understanding together with you on how we tackle misinformation.
https://t.co/YUWbpJSygy 

Our workshop is on March 7th 2022. Do register at MozFest to join us.

We are really bad with slowly moving crisis. And we do not spend enough time with unintended consequences. Euphoria of  the new takes over. This article gives a fundamental business design for positive AI.

@hunome @cmioffice What the world needs now. Gone absolutely stark raving mad out there. We need to ask why the aggression.

Great article: Do you see your future self vividly? Is it akin to you now but with some explained change? Or is your future self some manufactured vision board full of things you are not even all that interested in in a few years time?

In 2022 we look forward to engaging with you, on Hunome, to build our mutual understanding on how things were, are or should be across the many themes of interest to you. It is easy and at Hunome we build, solo or together, not share/comment. https://t.co/IymA0nqdp4
2021 was a big year for us at Hunome. Getting to a product launch, MVP/beta, is a big step, which we did, and we have built a great team - with 13 nationalities in the mix.

@openaccessguy @hunome Many views in the aggregate, combined, analysed on an ongoing basis is not an individual's opinion or a poll. It becomes understanding from many perspectives. Not tid bits. Multidimensional perception. Proven by the numbers in the end and by the logic in the shorter term.
This and watching (binge or otherwise) yet another series... What indeed could we build.
#startup #sharetobuild #humanaware #humanity #makesense #join
https://t.co/mpqhOzbZ33 - do sign up to start building on your favourite area of interest to understand better or share to build an understanding for others on something you have perspectives on.

Hunome is for you, curious about, and often wanting to make a difference to, how the world works. Our community is making sense of many kinds of themes. Build on own theme or add, build a multidimensional view and understanding. Join us in helping humanity make sense of itself!

Hunome is a #startup particularly for those who hold human(ity)-centered insights and understanding in high regard, curious about how the world works. You know these matters require multiple perspectives to make sense of them. This is our difference. #human #launch #humanness
